name: Only One Beach Ball
description:
Game made for the GMTK Jam 2019, using C and SDL2.
I didn't get as far as I wanted, but at least I made something!
The game idea was a collaboration with a friend.

Sorry for the weird control scheme.

I also included an image of some graphics I made but didn't have to time to put in the game.

Original concept (only some of which got implemented)

  • You are a lone beach ball in a crowded pool
  • Use your air to bounce as long as possible
  • Bouncing on people makes you go higher
  • Three types of people: chasers trying to catch you, swimmers moving around, and old people standing still
  • Getting caught ends the game
